description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 15 (site management arrangements), Condition 25 (Commercial Plant Noise and Vibration Assessment), Condition 26 (Commercial/Residential Sound Insulation), Condition 28 (Odour Abatement Equipment) and Condition 31 (Artificial Lighting) all in relation to Buildings B2 and C, of planning permission No. 2011/00407/COMB dated 23 December 2011.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Hammersmith Embankment Site Known As 'Fulham Reach'Land Bounded By Chancellor's Road,Distillery Road And Winslow Road,Including Sections Of Thames Path, River Thames,Frank Banfield Park And Highway LandLondon W6
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
